body.p:
Paducah Ky May 28/ 61
His Excellency Gov McGoffin
Sir
I beg leave to tender my Resignation as 3d Left of the McGoffin Artilery Ky State Guard

Approved.
Lloyd Tilghman
Maj Comdg
4th Ky Regt
K. S. G
Magoffin Artillery
Resignation of 3rd Lt
June 21. 1861
accepted
B. M
